resources.string: Convert a number from one base into another.

With 0xCAFE you can convert numbers from one base into another. The App got its name from programming languages like C, where a hex number starts with 0x. Therefore the expression \'0xCAFE\' is a valid number in C, with the decimal value 51966, try it out :)
This app is available opensource under https://zeroxcafe.googlecode.com
